org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.ldap

Class RetryingLdapContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.RetryingContext
      • org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.directory.RetryingDirContext
        • org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.ldap.RetryingLdapContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, DirContext, LdapContext, ExceptionRetryingProxy

    public abstract class RetryingLdapContext
extends RetryingDirContext
implements LdapContext
    RetryingLdapContext retries the methods defined by javax.naming.ldap.LdapContext according to the specified schedule.
    See Also:
    ExceptionRetryHandler, ExceptionRetryingProxy, LdapContext
